headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; A Sufficient Amount Subscribed for the Purchase of Mount Vernon--Blundering of Government Officials--Passports Granted, &c. FROM WASHINGTON.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is understood that the entire amount necessary for the purchase of Mount Vernon has already been subscribed-thirty thousand dollars only remaining unpaid; but the Association will not close the subscription lists until a sufficient sum shall be in hand to improve the property, now in the most neglected condition.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival ot the steamships Persia and Kangaroo, we have advices from England to June 11, three days later. The news confirms that previously received of the defeat of the Austrians at Magenta. On the 8th inst., the Emperor and the King of Sardinia entered Milan, amid the wildest enthusiasm of the population;
